sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import { fleetIcons, generalIcons, sellerImages } from '../../../themes'; import MarketplaceSidebar from '../Marketplace-sidebar'; import { Navbar } from '..'; import './styles.css'; import { Dropdown } from '../../../Cards'; const MarketPlaceFleet = () => { const [dropdownActive, setDropdownActive] = useState(false) const showDropdown = () => { setDropdownActive(!dropdownActive) } useEffect(() => { const dropdown = document.querySelector( '.shipment-dropdown-container', ); dropdownActive ? (dropdown.style.display = 'block') : (dropdown.style.display = 'none'); }, [ dropdownActive]); return (
